verbose_text: Alternatively, vitamin D can work through the activation of 25 hydroxyvitamin D (25OHD) by 1-alpha- hydroxylase expressed in pancreatic beta cells, directly improving insulin sensitivity by stimulating insulin receptor expression and the activation of PPAR-delta (peroxisome proliferator activated receptor delta), which has been associated to the regulation of fatty acid metabolism in skeletal muscle and adipose tissue [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
